meanings.definition: A military decoration worn on the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his fourragere during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The general's fourragere gleamed in the sunlight as he saluted.
meanings.sent3: The fourragere looked like a shiny ribbon on the soldier's shoulder.
meanings.sent4: Her fourragere symbolized her bravery and dedication to the country.
meanings.sent5: The fourragere added a touch of elegance to the uniform.

meanings.sent1: The soldier's fourragere matched perfectly with his forage cap.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stylish fourragere on her forage cap during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The fourragere on the forage cap made the soldier stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His fourragere-adorned forage cap was a unique fashion statement.
meanings.sent5: The forage cap with a fourragere looked smart and polished.

meanings.definition: A type of military cord worn on the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: The fourragere added a touch of color to the soldier's uniform.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the military cord of his fourragere before the inspection.
meanings.sent3: The fourragere cord on the shoulder looked like a fancy braid.
meanings.sent4: Her fourragere cord was a symbol of her rank and service.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the fourragere cord caught everyone's attention.
